text: Lauren Opal Boebert (born December 15, 1986) is an American politician, businesswoman, and gun-rights activist. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives from Colorado since 2021. Boebert has said things before that are thought to show belief in QAnon. This is a widely discredited theory. She said later that she was "not a follower" of QAnon. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Colorado Category:American political activists Category:Businesspeople from Colorado Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Lauren Boebert
